meta.title: LND Boilerplate - Modern Web Development Framework
meta.description: Build scalable web applications with our comprehensive boilerplate featuring TypeScript, Next.js, and modern tooling.

sections.title: Build the Future of Web Development
sections.subtitle: Enterprise Ready
sections.description: LND Boilerplate provides everything you need to build modern, scalable web applications. From development to deployment, we've got you covered.

features.title: TypeScript First
features.description: Full TypeScript support with strict type checking and excellent IDE integration.

features.title: Next.js 14
features.description: Latest Next.js with App Router, Server Components, and optimized performance.

features.title: Design Systems
features.description: Multiple design systems (Lora, Alisa) with easy switching and customization.

features.title: Component Library
features.description: Comprehensive UI components built with Shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS.

features.title: Flexible Layouts
features.description: Four layout templates with responsive design and sidebar management.

features.title: Developer Experience
features.description: Hot reload, ESLint, Prettier, and comprehensive development tooling.

testimonials.name: Alex Chen
testimonials.content: LND Boilerplate saved us weeks of setup time. The TypeScript integration is flawless and the component library is exactly what we needed.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: The design system switching feature is brilliant. We can easily adapt our app for different brands without rebuilding components.

testimonials.name: Mike Rodriguez
testimonials.content: Production-ready from day one. The layout system is incredibly flexible and the documentation is comprehensive.
